string.text: Fight is cancelled. The challenger was frightened and did not come out to the ring.
Has passed 10 seconds!
Has passed 20 seconds!
Has passed 30 seconds!
Has passed 40 seconds!
Has passed 50 seconds!
there Has passed minute!
there Has passed minute and 10 seconds!
there Has passed minute and 20 seconds!
Has passed one and a half minute!
Fight has begun!

Attention! Attention! Soon in arena new fight will be started! In the left corner of arena blood-thirsty and eternally hungry bloodsucker! In the right corner of arena... The person? Yes, the person! All name its Marked One!

Attention! Attention! Soon in arena new fight will be started! In the left corner of arena, he knows a kung fu, he is able to bend spoons, it is a burer! In the right corner of arena the hero, whose search never will end! All name its Marked One!
So! The opponent has killed the challenger. Here so number!
So! The challenger has killed the opponent, but was not in time during time and has lost!

Attention! Attention! Soon in arena new fight will be started! In the left corner of arena white, fluffy, but improbably malicious pseudo-dog! In the right corner of arena come from anywhere, going anywhere. All name its Marked One!

Attention! Attention! Soon in arena new fight will be started! In the left corner of arena, you know it, you love it. And he hates you. It is the Animal! In the right corner of arena still live Marked One!

Attention! Attention! Soon in arena new fight will be started! In the left corner of arena the expert on oriental combat sports and eutrophy a snork! In the right corner of arena the person without the past. All name its Marked One!
Time left! The challenger has lost, but still struggles for life!
So! The challenger has had time to kill the opponent and has won!
As you wish.
Stalker, friend! I beg, do not leave, help us! Anarchists have brought down our helicopter and now will finish us. We have wounded men, your help is necessary to us!
He-he, that's all. There is no your helicopter! Now get those governmental rats!
Well everything, the Wolfhound, you have got into a mess. The military helicopter here flies. Now they you, as puppies!
Professor has run away! Urgently all in a pursuit of Kruglov! He could not go far.
Marked One, help me!!! I'm hit!!!
You will manage, a jackal. At first school finish, and you will put ultimatums then.
If you will attack, I will destroy the information. Figs to you, instead of my works.
If you do not want me to destroy the results of research - steer clear.
Wolfhound, withdraw the dogs while tails have not peeled!
Everything, conversations are ended. Shooting begins.
This is business. Together we will finish these governmental rats.
Marked One. You will pay for this.
They follow us?! Marked One, stop them!
You are in short, a scientific blockhead. Give me results, or you will leave from here in a plastic bag.
Kruglov, I might not know karate, but I do know crazy. Want to quiz me on it? Or will you give the information?
Professor, you're a clever person. Give the information and be ready to go on all fours.

Kruglov, you yet have not understood?! We have brought down your fucking helicopter and that information which you carry is necessary to us. After you will give it to us, can bring down with the children. It is your last chance to get out from here, give the flash card and run.
Urgently come here! Near the Radar my children have caught the mad stalker, now we try to interrogate him.
Marked One, are you crazy? Immediately stop shooting! This is an order!
Marked One, immediately stop shooting! If you disobey the order, you're a corpse!
Marked One. For infringement of the code of "Duty" you are expelled from the grouping. Henceforth you're our enemy.
Marked One, you have disobeyed the order! Now you're a corpse! "Duty" does not forgive!
Stop shooting! In territory of "Duty" shooting is forbidden! Disobeyed will be punished!
Attention! For infringement of the law, a use of weapons in territory of "Duty", the Marked One is declared to be a criminal.
Attention! The murderer is found out! The order all being in "Duty" territory! Urgently destroy the murderer!
Stalker, help! We were attacked by mercenaries, half of ours was lost. Help us, we will return the favour.
Help us to make the way through an ambush near factory, I to you have sent co-ordinates. Be careful, Wolfhound is with bandits near the helicopter.
